original_text: You nations, after the battle your valuable things will quickly disappear! It will seem like locusts have eaten them all. Yes, we will take it all, like a hungry crowd of locusts. You nations, after the battle your valuable things will quickly disappear!
korean_text: 황충의 떼 같이 사람이 너희의 노략물을 모을 것이며 메뚜기가 뛰어오름 같이 그들이 그 위로 뛰어오르리라

sentences.original_text: your valuable things will quickly disappear!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 귀중한 것들이 빠르게 사라질 것이다!

sentences.original_text: It will seem like locusts have eaten them all.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 메뚜기들이 그것들을 모두 먹어버린 것처럼 보일 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Yes, we will take it all,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 우리는 그것들을 모두 가져갈 것이다,

sentences.original_text: like a hungry crowd of locusts.
your valuable things will quickly disappear!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 귀중한 것들이 빠르게 사라질 것이다!
